summary: It's been a while that I don't post here, whoops.  I haven't done any tech projects lately (other than tinkering with CSS for my main blog), but I have been keeping afloat at work.  Without going into too much detail, I really need to think about what I want to do next after this gig is up, voluntarily or not...
title: Cybersecurity, Perhaps?

summary: Harris shouts out crypto in her “Opportunity Agenda for Black Men”, one crypto exec leaves prison as another enters, and Stand With Crypto bets on the favorites

summary:
We’re well into times in which it’s clear why you’d care to own your data and host the software that you depend on.  Enshittification and surveillance capitalism are not heterodox concepts, so I won’t make that the point of this post. 
Yet, people on the internet can be quick to dissuade you from doing so...
title: What self-hosting teaches
